resources.string: This app is part of the course \"Distributed Systems\" of AUEB. Just click the button \"Find NYs most popular places\" and you will be transfered in NYC location at Google Maps. Select the area you are interested in and the top-K locations you want to see and click the button \"Done\". You\' ll get the final results with Markers on the map. Enough talking, let\'s try the app by yourselves!
App will close now for changes to be saved!

Long press somewhere in the map and a Polygon with 4 Markers will appear. You can move the 2 Markers to resize polygon and select the area you\'re interested in. If you long press again the map the polygon will be removed to start the proceduce from the beginning. When you\'re ready press the button \"DONE\" to get results.
You are not connected to a network or mappers are unavailable right now...
You should first put a number in the field and then click DONE
Press OK and wait for results from Reducer
You got final result from Reducer!
Press OK to see the results!
For process to begin it\'s necessary to set the desired area
Please wait while results come from Reducer...
You should first set \"From date\" field to continue...
You should first set \"Το date\" field to continue...
The results are sorted by popularity
No images found for selected POI!
